mapper.select: SELECT info.*, deal.dealAmount,deal.area, deal.dealYear, deal.dealMonth, deal.dealDay FROM (SELECT dealAmount, area, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, aptCode FROM housedeal) AS deal JOIN (SELECT apartmentName, buildYear, roadName, dong, lat, lng, dongCode, aptCode FROM houseinfo) AS info ON deal.aptCode = info.AptCode WHERE info.dong=#{dong};
